abstract: Arrest of New York Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver on corruption charges helps explain why Silver sought to inhibit work of anticorruption Moreland Commission established by Gov Andrew Cuomo; commission requested information about Silver's income sources outside his work as legislator, records that have come to form basis of malfeasance charges against him.
lead_paragraph: A federal prosecutor said the death of the Moreland Commission came as “a great relief” to the Assembly speaker, who actively fought its creation.
snippet: A federal prosecutor said the death of the Moreland Commission came as “a great relief” to the Assembly speaker, who actively fought its creation.

keywords.value: Moreland Commission to Investigate Public Corruption (NYS)
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Complaint Offers Motive for Silver’s Fight Against Corruption Panel
headline.print_headline: Records Show Silver’s Fight Against Panel
